name: RN apps: Markdown table with vertical scroll only in fullscreen view

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
RN Apps: Markdown table with vertical scroll only in fullscreen view
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Copy and post next 26 lines:
    | Header | Header | Header |
    | :-- | :-: | --: |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |
    | Left | Center | Right |

  2. Tap expand button
inline.expectedResult:
1. Tables should be able to scroll vertically.
  2. Vertical scroll bar should always be visible for user to know more rows.

Known: Table truncates and no gradient: https://mattermost.atlassian.net/browse/MM-22323
